mainHero.title: LearnView
mainHero.subtitle: Learn everything with Ai
mainHero.description: LearnView is an Open Source project to solve for global Educational challenges with help of Generative AI and LLMs.

product.title: Domains of LearnView
product.subtitle: Education and Learning is a vast domain and LearnView will cover many areas in this. Some ideas that the contributors might work on include

items.title: A plug n play template
description: LLM Tools for Maths, Science, Arts, Social Sciences, Engineering, Commerce, Arts, Medical learning etc for school, college and continuing education segments.
Tools for Exam Prep for SAT, GRE, GMAT, IIT JEE, IAS, NEET and other competitive exams.
Tech and Equipment training and operations manuals

items.title: Make it your own!
description: Classroom apps like Lesson Transcriptions, Summarization, QnA and Assignments.
Guided and/or personalized learning pathways using Gen AI agents.
Content generation tools for Lessons Plans, Content Chapters, QnA, Essays, Audio / Video content, Tests, Research Papers etc.
Creating training manuals and instruction guides
Tools related to Learning Management Systems

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: Join the LearnView Community: Contribute, Collaborate, and Innovate!

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
